ygData.subject: Re: bronze weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: *speaking of wisps....are these creatures found in Commonlands?  and are *they not the ones that hold the coveted gems that we so often *seek?  i ve *not seen
ygData.messageBody:
*speaking of wisps....are these creatures found in Commonlands? and are
*they not the ones that hold the coveted gems that we so often
*seek? i've
*not seen one in a long time, but last time I did, they /con red to
*me....I've since gained a few levels, though...what level are they?

Wisps are creatures hit only by magic, from which can be gained lightstones.
I don't think they carry any other stones or gems, but I could be wrong...
